title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 97.7 - Mandatory securities valuation reserve
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 97.7 - Mandatory securities valuation reserve

State Regulations

When the insurance company values separate account assets at market and complies with the asset maintenance requirements of section
97.5
of this Part, it need not maintain an asset valuation reserve or an interest maintenance reserve with respect to such assets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
97.7

Amended, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 25, effective
6/25/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
